title: How to unlock your Mystery Champion

replies.body: just a random thought gonna Q {{champion:245}} out here. What if you own all the skins...{{champion:119}}

If you own every champion and every skin, Riot will mail Phreak to you. Upon unpacking (a hammer or crowbar is recommended to open the crate), he will grant you one (1) high-five and up to three (3) puns of his choosing, at least one of which will be a never-before-heard exclusive pun.
Ima start buying skins now.
Yea but can I fuck it?

> [{quoted}](name=Jio Derako,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=JE2R6jm5,comment-id=00290000,timestamp=2015-06-23T23:24:07.710+0000)
>
> at least one of which will be a never-before-heard exclusive pun.

https://yamika.files.wordpress.com/2013/04/inconceivable.jpg

@RiotPhreak 

Your move.
i think if u own every character/skin they'll give u the new character lol hopes and wishes
oh wow brb purchasing everything so I can get a Phreak high five and 3 exclusive puns.
f you own every skin, riot will sign you up for free financial advisement since you spend $4,000 on a free game

Psst it's a mystery champion not a mystery skin. Rito already said in the Pool Party FAQ that if you own all the champions, you'll receive a mystery skin instead. Not sure what happens if you own all the skins and all the champions in the entire game though--but kudos to you if that's the case!
{{summoner:31}}

If you own all available to purchase skins then I assume they would dig into their Vault to grant a skin you do not own, I mean there were a bunch of skins that most people will not have from the earlier Days of League
...Oo king rammus for people who is not me
They give you RP if you have everything.
What happens if I don't have a facebook account? Do I not get rewarded like the rest of the community?

> Straight up, if you want the Mystery Champ and don't use Facebook, just make a fake account. It won't hurt anyone's feelings.
  Riot NaKyle  - 9 days ago

Facebook has a strict policy that you're not supposed to create a fake account. In fact, because Facebook is so dead-set on mining your personal data, you can no longer create an account simply by using your e-mail. No. Instead you need to give them a telephone number or a scanned image of a personal ID. I suppose in a few more years they'll want a blood sample and a set of finger prints too.

Hey Riot... Here's an idea! Just activate our free champ in-game without making us jump through hoops and support corporations with policies that infringe upon our personal privacy.

Not true. Just to prove you wrong I made a Facebook account on the spot in about 20 seconds (Facebook will not take me to jail for this). They're not asking for that much personal information, jeez. Not to mention AGAIN that 
1. Taking less than a minute to log in to or create a Facebook is NOT jumping through hoops.
2. Riot said that they are not to post of look at personal information.
3. The only reason they're doing this is to expand the Lguea community. They could care less about what you post, so don't think your life is worth Riot's time to gather information from.
Note: If you call me out for being "ill-informed", please just feel free to ask a Riot employee if I'm wrong on ANYTHING I just said.
When do we get the free champ? I participated in the event and didn't get one.
In the article, it says "We expect to ship out the Mystery Champions by July 1.".
{{champion:26}} It's July 2nd and I didn't get mine
{{champion:161}} I see what you did there
{{champion:64}} I don't
{{champion:44}} What you did there was truly outrageous.
{{champion:245}} Just go back and try again.
what if i have every champion?
Mystery skin instead
yup yup! cannot wait for my skin :D... better be a good one since it will be right after my birthday RIOT! XD
My birthday will be in 364 days after they give me this mystery champion. Thank you Riot, for celebrating my birthday by giving me this present.
Mine is today!
Happy Birthday!

*asks question likely in faq*
*gets link to faq or told it is in faq*
I like it when the answer is in a comment above them. It must be so hard for people to read.
Plot twist, everyone gets the new champ.
Thanks for this, Riot, we really appreciate all the little things you do for us! :)
I will {{item:3070}} if i get {{champion:44}}
I pray for the poor souls that get{{summoner:14}}  {{champion:17}}
My mystery skin for good behavior was Cotton Tail Teemo. Confirmed that Riot promotes toxicity.
Pray for their forgiveness, as they must have commited major sins in their life.
PLay a normal, buy taric, unlock champion, problem solved
tears of joy? {{champion:44}} {{champion:44}}
Can someone explain this to me like I'm five?{{champion:1}}

The nice people at Riot are giving you a random champion for free!
You just have to have connected to the Facebook Friend Finder~~, and helped with the Pool Party.~~
~~Did you win at least one matchmade game with a 5Man premade last week?~~
Did you connect to the Facebook Friend Finder?
If you answer yes to ~~both of those~~ that, you're good
You don't need to win a 5man premade, it doesn't say anything about having needed to make at least 1 point. That was for rewards such as Pool Party Icon and Pool Party Mundo.

After looking back over the rewards, it appears that you are right and I am wrong. I apologize for that. Thank you for correcting me

Also, someone downvoted you so I moved you back up to +1. Thanks again!
Found the ONE non-toxic player... (Burn the heretic) :) JK
will there be a pop-up telling me what champ i got or will i just have to search through my champ list?

You'll get a pop-up, just like if your friend had mystery gifted you a skin or champion or anything else.
... Or so I'm told... {{champion:32}}

To all the people asking questions that are answered in the text above, please just read the text it has pretty much every question relating to this topic answered. Such as how to connect to facebook and what not. If you have a question that's not answered there go to the faq.
Not that I really care, I just play for fun now, but what about for those of us who have attained every champion so far?
Mystery skin instead. Believe it or not, but the FAQ answers common questions like yours! {{champion:222}}
